GSD.product_version: versions from v4.12 to before v5.10.137
GSD.description:
md-raid: destroy the bitmap after destroying the thread

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.137 by commit e0bdaed154e5b9cc4310ddaf5da290483d00e6ba, it was introduced in version v4.12 by commit 48df498daf62e1292868005675331929305067f0. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: md-raid: destroy the bitmap after destroying the thread
